author: jdillon
msg: Adding README.txt to briefly explain how to build w/m2

author: jdillon
msg: Changed module directory names to be the same as their artifactId to simplify m2 config & make it obvious where they come from
Changed top-level pom to use javamail as the artifactId to be consistent with its location in our svn tree

author: jdillon
msg: Added custom build elements that represent the m2 std + including LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt

author: jdillon
msg: Changed layout of mail-1.3 to conform to the m2 stnd
Using genesis to pick up common configuration
Removed use of properties to handle versions
Updated formatting and added copyrights to xmls that missed it

author: ndbeyer
msg: Insert missing ASL comment into source files.
